overview:
Bunder is co-founder and director of JMT Ventures Limited, the UK’s largest publisher of Jewish interest sites. These include: SomethingJewish, Jewtastic, SomeoneJewish, JewishBlogging.com and Jewish.net.

As well as JMT Ventures, Bunder is also co-fouder, editor and publisher of JLifestyle, the UK’s only Jewish lifestyle magazine that goes direct to 20,000 homes.

For over a decade, Bunder has worked in the digital media industry for leading organisations including: Teletext (technology and feature writer), InfoSpace (project manager) and BBC (broadcast journalist).
